_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_ARGUMENTS_IS_HTML_: If True, an HTML list (<ul><li>...</li></ul>) is created. Otherwise, a text list is generated
_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_ARGUMENTS_IS_SIMPLE_AR: Indicates whether only a simple array without objects is used
_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_ARGUMENTS_KEY_LABEL_: Key for the label to be displayed (only if isSimpleArray=false)
_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_ARGUMENTS_KEY_LABEL_CA: Function for generating labels with two parameters (item, itemIndex)
_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_ARGUMENTS_TAG_: HTML tag for the entire list
_PAGE_FILTER_LIST_DESCRIPTION_: The function creates a list from an array.
